text:
Love Poems with Wind Chimes by Cyril Wong
.
The first iteration of ArtScience Late at Home features poet Cyril Wong’s beautifully calming and experimental solo poetry set from his home, combining his love poems (both sung and spoken) with wind chimes.
.
Watch at https://www.apart.sg/literary-arts/artsciencescyrilwong-s7-ng27k
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason7 | @artsciencemuseumsg  @cyrilsingstheblues
